zh: 你这件衬衫该洗了。

en: May I exchange this shirt for a smaller size?
zh: 这件衬衫我能换个小号的吗？

en: This shirt is the standard size.
zh: 这衬衫是标准码。

en: This shirt wants washing.
zh: 这衬衫得洗洗了。

en: I don't think this shirt goes with that red tie.
zh: 我觉得这衬衫跟那条红领带不搭。

en: The color of the shirt held fast.
zh: 这件衬衫不掉色。

en: This shirt is a little bit loose.
zh: 这件衬衫有点肥。

en: This shirt is too small for me to wear.
zh: 这件衬衫太小了，我穿不下。

en: I don't like this shirt. Show me another.
zh: 我不喜欢这件衬衫，给我看件别的。

en: These shirts are selling like hotcakes.
zh: 这些衬衫特别好卖。

en: Whose shirt is this?
zh: 这是谁的衬衫？

en: This shirt doesn't go with that tie at all.
zh: 这件衬衫和那条领带一点都不搭。

en: This shirt costs ten dollars.
zh: 这件衬衫十块钱。

en: Put this jacket on, and you'll be much warmer.
zh: 把这件外套穿上，你就暖和多了。

en: Can I try on this jacket?
zh: 我能试一下这件外套吗？

en: I don't like this jacket.
zh: 我不喜欢这件外套。

en: Is this jacket right for me?
zh: 这件外套适合我吗？

en: This jacket sets well.
zh: 这件外套很合身。

en: This jacket is a tight fit.
zh: 这件外套有点紧。

en: Do you have this jacket in different colors?
zh: 这件外套还有别的颜色吗？

en: This blot can't be wiped out.
zh: 这个污渍擦不掉。

en: This zipper doesn't zip smoothly.
zh: 这个拉链不太好拉。

en: Could you give me a hand with this stew?
zh: 你能帮我弄一下这锅炖菜吗？

en: The stew smells delicious.
zh: 这炖菜闻起来真香。

en: This system has obvious defects.
zh: 这个系统有明显的缺陷。

en: With this system a protection circuit has been built in.
zh: 这个系统内置了一个保护电路。

en: Do you think this jelly's firm enough to eat yet?
zh: 你觉得这果冻成型了吗，能吃了吗？

en: This jet travels about three times as fast as the speed of sound.
zh: 这架喷气式飞机的速度大约是音速的三倍。

en: These jeans feel too tight. May I try on another size?
zh: 这条牛仔裤太紧了，我能换个号试试吗？

en: The sheets feel damp.
zh: 床单感觉潮乎乎的。

en: This salad tastes of lemon.
zh: 这沙拉有一股柠檬味。

en: This size is too large for me.
zh: 这个号对我来说太大了。

en: Please call this lady a taxi.
zh: 请帮这位女士叫辆出租车。

en: Please move out of the way so this lady can go through.
zh: 请让一下，让这位女士过去。

en: This computer network is, as it were, the nervous system of the company.
zh: 这个计算机网络可以说就是公司的神经系统。

en: This computer is second to none in quality.
zh: 这台电脑的质量是数一数二的。

en: This computer runs on batteries.
zh: 这台电脑是用电池供电的。

en: This computer can cope with much work.
zh: 这台电脑能处理很多工作。

en: This computer is powerful, efficient, and easy to use.
zh: 这台电脑性能强，效率高，还特别好用。

en: This computer often goes out of order.
zh: 这台电脑经常出故障。

en: This computer will prove costly in the long run.
zh: 长远来看，买这台电脑会很费钱。

en: Operation of this computer is tricky.
zh: 这台电脑操作起来有点复杂。

en: This computer is superior to that one.
zh: 这台电脑比那一台好。

en: I know a lot about this computer.
zh: 我对这台电脑很了解。

en: This computer saves a great deal of time.
zh: 这台电脑能省下很多时间。

en: I bought this computer one year ago and it's already a dinosaur.
zh: 我一年前买的这台电脑，现在已经老掉牙了。

en: These days he disobeys his parents.
zh: 他最近都不听父母的话了。

en: Recently we have had many mild days.
zh: 最近天气一直挺暖和的。

en: These days people visit here.
zh: 最近来这儿的人挺多的。

en: I have seen nothing of him lately.
zh: 我最近都没见过他。

en: I'm not feeling well lately.
zh: 我最近身体不太舒服。

en: You can't rely on him these days to do a proper job.
zh: 最近都别指望他能把活儿干好。

en: I have a little time for reading these days.
zh: 我最近还有点时间看书。

en: I have little time for reading these days.
zh: 我最近几乎没时间看书。

en: It is getting warmer and warmer these days.
zh: 最近天越来越暖和了。

en: Today it's difficult to make ends meet.
zh: 现如今，想维持生计真不容易。

en: Children learn to swim in school today.
zh: 现在的孩子在学校里学游泳。

en: It gets dark about half past five these days.
zh: 最近五点半左右天就黑了。

en: I haven't been in contact with Mr Smith recently.
zh: 我最近没和史密斯先生联系。
